kv8.7:5.1.pli: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv8.7:5.3.pli: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?

kv8.7:5.5.pli: atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv8.7:5.7.pli: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyati …pe…

kv8.7:5.8.pli: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?

kv8.7:6.2.pli: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv8.7:6.4.pli: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?

kv8.7:6.6.pli: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv8.7:6.9.pli: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?

kv8.7:7.1.pli: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?

kv8.7:7.3.pli: Atthi tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ atthi rūpāyatanaṃ, na ca tena cakkhunā taṃ rūpaṃ passatīti?

kv8.7:7.5.pli: atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, na ca tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?

kv8.7:7.8.pli: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv8.7:8.2.pli: atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, na ca tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?

kv8.7:8.5.pli: atthi tattha manāyatanaṃ atthi dhammāyatanaṃ, na ca tena manena taṃ dhammaṃ vijānātīti?

kv8.7:9.1.pli: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ, tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti?

kv8.7:9.3.pli: Atthi tattha mūlagandho sāragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho āmagandho vissagandho sugandho duggandhoti?

kv8.7:10.1.pli: Atthi tattha jivhāyatanaṃ atthi rasāyatanaṃ, tāya jivhāya taṃ rasaṃ sāyatīti?

kv8.7:10.3.pli: Atthi tattha mūlaraso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambilaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ loṇiyaṃ khāriyaṃ lambilaṃ kasāvo sādu asādūti?

kv8.7:11.1.pli: Atthi tattha kāyāyatanaṃ atthi phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, tena kāyena taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusatīti?

kv8.7:11.3.pli: Atthi tattha kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ sukhasamphassaṃ dukkhasamphassaṃ garukaṃ lahukanti?

kv8.7:12.4.pli: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittanti?

kv8.7:12.6.pli: Hañci atthi tattha ghānanimittaṃ jivhānimittaṃ kāyanimittaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv8.8:1.3.pli: Rūpabhavo rūpagati rūpasattāvāso rūpasaṃsāro rūpayoni rūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:1.5.pli: nanu arūpabhavo arūpagati arūpasattāvāso arūpasaṃsāro arūpayoni arūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:1.7.pli: Hañci arūpabhavo …pe… arūpattabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv8.8:2.3.pli: Pañcavokārabhavo gati sattāvāso saṃsāro yoni viññāṇaṭṭhiti attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:2.7.pli: Hañci catuvokārabhavo gati …pe… attabhāvapaṭilābho, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv8.8:3.1.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpadhātuyā, so ca rūpabhavo rūpagati rūpasattāvāso rūpasaṃsāro rūpayoni rūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:3.3.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ arūpesu, so ca rūpabhavo rūpagati …pe… rūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:3.5.pli: atthi rūpaṃ rūpadhātuyā, so ca pañcavokārabhavo gati …pe… attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:3.7.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ arūpesu, so ca pañcavokārabhavo gati …pe… attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:4.1.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ arūpesu, so ca arūpabhavo arūpagati arūpasattāvāso arūpasaṃsāro arūpayoni arūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:4.3.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpadhātuyā, so ca arūpabhavo arūpagati …pe… arūpattabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:4.5.pli: atthi rūpaṃ arūpesu, so ca catuvokārabhavo gati …pe… attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:4.7.pli: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpadhātuyā, so ca catuvokārabhavo gati …pe… attabhāvapaṭilābhoti?

kv8.8:5.3.pli: Nanu rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ arūpaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti?

kv8.8:5.5.pli: Hañci rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ arūpaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv8.8:6.1.pli: Rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ arūpaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, atthi rūpaṃ arūpesūti?

kv8.8:6.3.pli: Kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, atthi nekkhammesu kāmā, atthi anāsavesu āsavā, atthi apariyāpannesu pariyāpannāti?
